Providing Vermont and other states with the flexibility to build upon health care reform will result in better care and greater access at a lower cost. Allowing us to become a laboratory for innovation and excellence will help Vermonters, while once again allowing us to lead the way. SKY PRESENTERS APOLOGISE FOR SEXIST COMMENTS Sky football presenters Andy Coulson Gray and Richards Richard Keys have been suspended by Sky Sports after being caught by an open microphone making off-air comments about lineswoman Sian Massey at the Wolves-Liverpool game on Saturday. Somebody better get down there and explain offside to her, Richard Keys said. "Can you believe that?" Gray responded. "A female linesman. Women don't know the offside rule." Looking back, I see there are things the administration could have done differently and better with respect to wartime detention, he wrote. The accounts of the book also quote Rumsfeld as criticizing his colleagues in the President Bush administration, including both of President Bush 's secretaries of state, Colin Powell and later Condoleezza Rice . Donald Rumsfeld , who served as President Bush 's defense chief for six years after holding the same job under president Gerald Ford in the 1970s, acknowledged that "in a war, many things cost lives."
